description: At Access, our mission is to create abundant internet on networks that are always fast and always open. Google Fiber provides superfast Internet to homes across the U.S. We want to bring Google Fiber to customers even faster, so we’re focused on making deployment more efficient and less intrusive.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.
  • 2 years of experience working with enterprise software and systems.
  • Experience with mixed operating systems (e.g. Linux, Red Hat, Windows, etc).
  • Ability to work non-standard hours as needed.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience with integrating third party services for internal systems.
  • Experience working with industry partners in the enterprise space.
  • Strong customer service, leadership, organizational, communication and interface skills.
responsibilities:
• Identify and implement technical solutions to efficiently troubleshoot and scale Fiber’s BSS and OSS operations.
  • Design, code, test, and maintain tools to support cross-functional and cross-metro users.
  • Build relationships with internal and external partners to help drive long term system vision.
  • Analyze and monitor key metrics to drive request prioritization and issue resolution.
title: Technical Solutions Engineer, OSS/BSS Operations
